content.prompt: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices printed, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Espérons que le mauvais temps ne va pas durer.
Je suis contente que tu rentres si tôt.
Il est peut-être temps que tu trouves un autre job.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
